credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Church triumphant over falsehood
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, black chalk
description: Drawing of falsehood depicted as a woman falling over while a bishop pulls off her mask.  He is seated with a chalice in his other hand.  Looking over his shoulder is the Virgin Mary (?) and a bird flies over at center.
name: Drawing
